thread.section_title: RC Willey Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of RC Willey | rcwilley.com | 8 of 150
thread.title: Cheryl

author: Cheryl
title: Cheryl
text: I have been shopping for furniture for a few months. I went to the Meridian R C Willey and found the pieces that I liked. Some weeks later I saw the Facebook notification of the President's Day Sale and the pieces that I had chosen were discounted. I ordered online and am receiving delivery soon. I am thrilled with the affordable delivery charge! I am not a fan of online shopping, but since I had seen the set in person, I was comfortable ordering.
